trans-unit.source: Provides a collection of <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartTransformer"></xref> objects.
trans-unit.target: 提供一組<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartTransformer"></xref>物件。

trans-unit.source: The WebPartTransformerCollection class is a collection of <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartTransformer> objects, typically used by the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartConnection> object to manage a set of <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartTransformer> objects for a connection.
trans-unit.target: WebPartTransformerCollection 類別是集合<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartTransformer>通常所使用的物件<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartConnection>物件，以管理一組<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartTransformer>連接物件。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartTransformer> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartConnection> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartTransformer>

trans-unit.source: The transformers related to a Web Parts connection can be retrieved through the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartConnection.Transformers%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Web 組件連接到相關的轉換可以透過擷取<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartConnection.Transformers%2A>屬性。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartConnection.Transformers%2A>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartTransformerCollection"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新執行個體<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartTransformerCollection"></xref>類別。

trans-unit.source: Adds an object to the end of the collection.
trans-unit.target: 將物件加入至集合結尾。

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartTransformer"></xref> to be added to the end of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartTransformerCollection"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartTransformer"> </xref>加入結尾<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartTransformerCollection"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: The index at which transformer has been added.
trans-unit.target: 索引處 transformer 已新增。

trans-unit.source: Returns a value indicating whether a particular transformer exists in the collection.
trans-unit.target: 傳回值，指出集合中是否有特定的轉換程式。

trans-unit.source: The Contains method enables you to check a particular <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartTransformer> object and determine whether it is part of a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartTransformerCollection> object.
trans-unit.target: Contains 方法可讓您檢查特定<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartTransformer>物件，並判斷它是否屬於<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartTransformerCollection>物件。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartTransformerCollection> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartTransformer>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartTransformer"></xref> that is checked to determine whether it is in the collection.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartTransformer"> </xref> ，就會檢查以判斷它是否在集合中。

trans-unit.source: A Boolean value that indicates whether a particular transformer is in the collection.
trans-unit.target: 布林值，指出是否在集合中特定的轉換程式。

trans-unit.source: Copies the collection to an array of <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartTransformer"></xref> objects.
trans-unit.target: 將集合複製到陣列<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartTransformer"></xref>物件。

trans-unit.source: The CopyTo method is useful when you want to assemble a custom array that can contain all the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartTransformer> objects in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartTransformerCollection> collection, a subset of those objects, or a superset of those objects.
trans-unit.target: CopyTo 方法時，您想要組合可以包含所有的自訂陣列<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartTransformer>中的物件<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartTransformerCollection>集合，這些物件的子集或超集，這些物件。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartTransformerCollection> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartTransformer>

trans-unit.source: An array of <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartTransformer"></xref> objects to contain the copied collection.
trans-unit.target: 陣列<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartTransformer"></xref>包含複製的集合的物件。

trans-unit.source: The starting point in the array at which to place the collection contents.
trans-unit.target: 放置集合內容之陣列中的起點。

trans-unit.source: Returns the position of a particular member in the collection.
trans-unit.target: 傳回集合中的特定成員的位置。

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartTransformer"></xref> that is a member of the collection.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartTransformer"> </xref>也就是集合的成員。

trans-unit.source: An integer that indicates the position of a particular object in the collection.
trans-unit.target: 整數，表示集合中特定物件的位置。

trans-unit.source: Inserts a transformer into the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartTransformerCollection"></xref> collection at the specified index.
trans-unit.target: 將插入的轉換器到<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartTransformerCollection"></xref>集合指定索引處。

trans-unit.source: The zero-based index at which a value should be inserted.
trans-unit.target: 值應該插入以零為起始的索引。

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartTransformer"></xref> to insert.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartTransformer"> </xref>插入。

trans-unit.source: Gets a value indicating whether the collection is read-only.
trans-unit.target: 取得值，指出集合是否唯讀。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the collection and its items cannot be changed; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果無法變更集合，其項目。否則， <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Returns a member of the collection based on its position in the collection.
trans-unit.target: 傳回根據其在集合中的位置集合的成員。

trans-unit.source: The index of a particular <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartTransformer"></xref> in a collection.
trans-unit.target: 特定的索引<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartTransformer"></xref>集合中。

trans-unit.source: The located at index.
trans-unit.target: The located at index.

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 即將加入。

trans-unit.target: 即將加入。

trans-unit.target: 即將加入。

trans-unit.target: 即將加入。

trans-unit.target: 即將加入。

trans-unit.target: 即將加入。

trans-unit.target: 即將加入。

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 即將加入。

trans-unit.source: Removes the first occurrence of a specific transformer.
trans-unit.target: 移除第一個出現的特定的轉換器。

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartTransformer"></xref> to remove from the collection.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartTransformer"> </xref>若要從集合中移除。
